phrases: Why am I being so indecisive about this?
Well, I will be going now, Ayumi.
Good morning.
Y-Yeah, morning.
Then, let us go.
Over here.
Episode 9 The World is Not in Here
Is not it a bit early compared to when the gig starts?
It is so I can buy goods from the gig.
You cannot do that after it is over?
Most of the popular merchandising sell out.
I guess that is how things go?
In any case, you are a pretty big fangirl.
If that is so, you should have just met Sala yesterday.
I do not have any desire to buy t-shirts, hoodies, or stuff like that.
I just want their highly functional smartphone case!
It comes with an internal battery and a high-sound quality linear PCM recorder!
Yeah, I get it.
that is nice.
You do not want one?
If I bought one, we would have a matching pair.
You are fine with that?
Oh, I see.
Please make sure to not buy one.
She said it so bluntly... it is kind of shocking.
There is a huge line...
I guess we have to honestly line up.
Why are you just standing there?
Well, I am not buying anything.
Either way, you are here with me.
If I am alone, I will not have anyone to talk to so I will be bored.
In the first place, did not she hate me?
Inviting me to gigs, lining up together... why are we getting all friendly?
I hope they do not sell out.
What is wrong?
No, well, I was thinking it is a long line...
Of course, they are a band that is popular globally.
In the first place, they are not a group that is too good for a box of this capacity.
So she is someone amazing...
Got my case!
Look, look, look here!
What do you think about the logo on the back!
ZHIEND is such a figurative art!
Yeah, I think it is wonderful.
Is not it!
So awesome!
It looks so cool!
In the end, you are a fangirl...
It is starting!
Lying before me
Scene painted in green
I was never found
And I played hide and seek
There remains a little scar on your face still facing down
To the ground you hold yourself and crouch like you have been wounded
I adored the days when we just want more things with no means oh
I adored when you were always just there for me by my side
What is this strange sensation?
Next up is a world premiere of a song right here in loving Japan!
TRIGGER!
Come now heading to the oblivion
To the darkness sink me
Future is lonely as it seems to be
And I am reaching from there
I remember this song..?
This should be the first time hearing it...
My mind is clear now I feel like I can do anything
When I want to do it, yeah
I feel I am notorious
Do you know what you can handle?
Do you know me?
Spinning round and round
Going back and forth
Will be here as an angel that is fallen deep
See there is the dark side waiting for me
Never end forever
Out on the rim no need to breathe ever I am
Big Brother
Yu, what is the matter?
I am sorry...
ZHIEND's new song was too sensational...
ZHIEND is so amazing after all.
It is a song that seems like you just cannot ever forget.
No matter what happens in the future...
What about you?
Haro-haro was Haro-haro.
Stable as usual.
It is time for dinner in D-block.
I repeat.
It is time for dinner in D-block.
Oh, I am starving right now!
It is this old man again...
Why is he here all the time?
Classical music is great.
There is virtually no stagnation... just like a mathematical formula.
So that is your little sister?
Yes...
I see... I pity you.
So there is a researcher that feels that way towards us?
Why are you here every day?
It is always the case that the extraordinary,
or hypotheses that trouble researchers are ridiculed.
That is why I am here, lost in thought.
I see...
Do you know about the Ptolemaic theory?
I believe I have heard of the term...
It is an extraordinary theory when you think in today's standards,
but back then it was the normal way of thought.
But, reality was different.
What do you think happened to the first person that asserted a different opinion?
Do Not Know...
He was treated as a nonconformist, shunned,
and could not do anything anymore.
Just like how I am now.
I see...
All right!
It is curry today!
I am sure there are chemicals that boost abilities in it again,
so it will taste like medicine.
But still, Ayu thinks that curry is chock full of deliciousness that makes people happy!
I wish Big Brother Shun was here too.
The three of us eating together!
Big Brother's ability is way too protrusive.
That is just impossible.
What was his ability?
Traveling through time... time-leap.
That is just too amazing!
Because he has such a power that is too strong,
he is being imprisoned...
Poor Big Brother Shun...
Yeah, you are right.
So we should not talk about this ever again.
Time to eat!
Tastes like medicine as usual...
They think that my ability is merely taking over someone is body
for no longer than five seconds.
If they had caught on to my true ability,
I am sure they would take my freedom away,
just like my big brother.
But, if I keep getting tested like this, such a day is not in the distant future...
It is been a while.
Stay put, and stay quiet.
Kumagami..!
Did something happen?
I finally found someone with telepathy.
Is that for real?
Yeah.
And, that person can send AND receive.
That is amazing...
But, that person has already been caught, right?
Exactly.
First off, take over the guy
with the pompadour behind you to your right.
He is someone with the ability to pulverize, that I brought with me.
However, he does not have much power.
Got it...
W-what is this?
Next, I have the location of the one with telepathy.
Take this.
Just make sure to time it right.
You are the only hope that we have.
If you fail, they will dispose of you, and we will follow you soon after.
Yeah, I know that...
Oh man, is Kumagami really seeing that sissy right now?
Oh, Shichino, you jealous?
Of course not!
We have been waiting a long time for this.
This is the only timing that the little brother will get serious.
He just has a sister complex!
The two of them are always playing alone together!
That is especially why.
The only thing we can do is to trust that guy.
But this bet... what is our odds of winning it?
I am troubled if it is not 100!
I will not allow for any mistakes!
By the way, when is your ability going to be developed?
We properly found someone who had telepathic abilities.
That is forthcoming!
I will make sure to use it at a really good place!
That is a flag setting up for your death.
I am not going to die!
Hey!
Cut the chatter!
Dammit...
Is this world really going to change?
It is time.
Head back.
So that is it for smelling the outside air?
Sheeesh.
Yeah, yeah.
Hey, you.
Did you accept something from someone?
Nothing...
Then, you are fine.
Why are those people treated differently than us?
They are not as powerful as our big brother,
but they all have abilities that are pretty amazing on their own.
Now, all the plans for saving Big Brother are in place...
the only question now is... when to go through with it.
That ends today's program.
All test subjects other than those called over must return to their rooms immediately.
I guess we will go back.
Oh, come to think, they called Ayu over!
Why did not you say something so important!
Go back.
Wait!
That is absurd!
My little sister has no abilities!
Why is she being called over!
Big Brother Yu!
Ayumi!
An earthquake?
We have shut D-block down.
Until the next set of instructions are given, please stand by where you are now.
What is going on?
I repeat.
We have shut D-block down.
I have a really bad feeling about this!
Until the next set of instructions are given, please stand by where you are now.
Open up, please!
Come on!
Dammit...
You are...
What just happened?
What happened to Ayumi?
Your little sister's ability was forced out into the open.
Her ability was collapse.
The reason they shut D-block down was because half of it collapsed from her power.
What about Ayumi?
She is fine.
However, because her ability was too dangerous, she is being restrained right now.
Just like my big brother...
No.
After they dissect her, they are going to get rid of her.
Is this time for you to be standing still?
You can save her if you use the true ability that you possess.
The most powerful of abilities... plunder.
How do you know...?
Before that... you realize you have no time left, right?
Indeed... he is right...
All right!
And now, they will dispose of me as well...
I am going up against someone with telepathy...
Got To be mindless... mindless... mindless...
Who is it?
A voice within my head?
So this is what the powers of telepathy do?
What do you want with me?
If I could see his face!
What about my face?
It is fine.
I am done here already.
What do you mean
Hey!
Stop!
Can you hold on a second?
Um, I do not need to erase this guy's memory, right?
I hope not...
- What is going on?
- Let me out!
Let me out!
- Shutting down B-block! - It hurts...
I repeat.
There is an emergency situation in D-block.
All employees arrange yourselves according to regulations.
Dammit!
What is going on out there?
- I do not care who it is, just tell me..! - Help me... help me...
This voice!
I can figure out the direction, too!
- Hey!
Let me out of this place!
- Mom, I am scared...
Big Brother, can you hear me?
It is me, Yu!
Just kill me now...
Yu?
You took that kind of power?
If they find out, it will make a huge mess!
That is how big the current situation is.
They are about to dissect Ayumi!
Ayumi?
Why?
She gained an ability powerful enough to destroy the facility!
Even Ayumi, too...
I will save you, Big Brother!
So, do your time-leap, and change this world for us!
How does he plan on coming over here?
Dammit!
Only if I could get light into my eyes..!
What?
What is wrong?
Shichino?
Dammit... why do I have to do this for a sister-complex guy like you!
What the hell
We do not have time!
Take my power of permeation!
Are you sure?
I am telling you, we have no time left!
Got it!
This way!
Hurry up and go!
I am sorry!
I am sure my big brother will change this world, so..!
What is this ability...
It tires me out...
What is wrong?
I got Shichino's ability, too!
I will be right there, Big Brother!
Big Brother!
It is been a while, Yu.
But, I have to get going immediately.
Right...
I am leaving you to do the rest, Big Brother.
Yeah, for the future...
No, for everyone.
I am going to change the world!
Dispose of him!
Please do not surprise me!
Where is this?
A hospital.
You collapsed during the gig.
Do you remember that?
That is right...
Ayumi is already...
Did you have a bad dream or something?
Dream... was the thing I just saw really a dream..??
No, in the past Ayumi had said that she felt like we had
one more member in our family...
It is best if you do not get up yet.
I might have a big brother... no, there should be one out there...
What?
Oh, so you remember now.
Who is it?
One with the ability to find wielders of special abilities, is the quick way to put it.
Oh, it is you!
You are pretty handsome when you are dry!
You were there too, in my dream!
I think this is the first time you have seen me looking like this...
Kumagami.
You know about my big brother, do not you...
Well, yeah.
Tell me everything.
Calm down.
That is what I planned to do by coming here.
If you quietly follow me, every question you have in your head will all melt away.
And, that is when you are going to go rescue your little sister.
What did you say just now?
You are going to go rescue your little sister, Yu Otosaka.
How can I rescue someone who is already dead!
At this point, do not you know what
the ability your big brother Shunsuke had as well?
Got it.
Um, about Shunsuke... are you talking about THE Shunsuke?
Yeah, I am.
You were his little brother?
You guys look nothing alike!
That does not matter, does it?
Um, can I go see him as well?
It is been a while now.
How do you know him?
He is the one that guided my path after my big brother turned into a cripple.
I have met the one person I can put my trust in,
and that is how I am here now.
So that person was my big brother...
Fine.
Follow me.
Thank you very much.
We have to walk from here.
This is amazing!
Money is the one thing we have plenty of.
This place is..?
You could say it is a research facility for special abilities.
Is not that the enemy for all of us?
Not so.
Stop yapping and follow me.
Amazing!
Can I record this?
Of course not.
It is quite a chore.
This is the final stronghold for us, after all.
Here, ahead of me, is my big brother...
It is you, Yu.
It is been a while.
I brought him.
Yeah, thanks.
Is it really... my big brother..?
You still have not remembered?
It seems like he still has not regained the memory that Maedomori erased.
I see.
Erased memories?
What is that?
That voice must be Nao.
It is been quite a while.
Yes.
I still walk down the path that you have guided me onto.
As a result, you are helping out quite a bit.
You are doing well.
Thank you very much.
What is it?
And what about you, Yu?
I am your big brother, you know?
This is the melodramatic rekindling!
You are not going to embrace me or anything?
I am confused... I am full of questions...
What, that is a bit lonely.
Though, I guess that is reaping what I have sewn.
Well then, I guess I will tell the whole story.
Right, Pooh?
Yeah...
Pooh?
Now, let us start the long, long story about my time-leap...
I am definitely interested!
What... is he going to start talking about..?
